title: Elegant Vaibhavam Polki & Emerald Haaram - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Showcases meticulously set Polki Diamonds (uncut diamonds) with excellent clarity. Features vibrant green Emeralds
carefully selected for their color and luster. Enhanced with smaller pave set diamonds around each Polki and Emerald setting
features: This stunning two-strand Haaram combines the grandeur of traditional South Indian design with a modern sensibility. The central pendant is an oval Polki encased in a pave diamond setting, mirroring the oval setting around each Polki stone on the strand. Each Emerald is also similarly set in a flower shaped setting with pave diamonds around the emerald. It creates a visually rich tapestry. The Haaram's design evokes the majestic jewelry of the Nizam era, yet it retains a contemporary elegance.

description: This Haaram represents a harmonious blend of tradition and sophistication. The use of Polki diamonds – valued for their natural, uncut beauty – and vibrant Emeralds speaks to enduring cultural aesthetics. The Hyderabadi craftsmanship ensures both the beauty and longevity of this investment piece. Owning this Vaibhavam Haaram is not just acquiring jewelry; it's embracing a legacy of artistry and refined taste.
